Create Account NBA Draft History ESPN Illustration Our Draft Archives Get expert analysis from previous drafts here. 2025 2026 2025 2024 2023 2022 2021 2020 2019 2018 2017 2016 2015 2014 2013 2012 2011 2010 2009 2008 2007 2006 2005 2004 2003 2002 2001 Latest from Shams Charania Cleveland Cavaliers president Koby Altman – the architect of the burgeoning title contender – has signed a contract extension through 2029-30, sources tell ESPN. Cavs' front office, including Mike Gansey and Brandon Weems, received extensions amid rise to No. 1 seed in East. Coaches who game-planned against them weigh in. 17d Jeff Borzello Best picks, surprising moves and top trades from the NBA draft: Making sense of Round 1 Our ESPN draft insiders break down the twists, turns and trades of Wednesday's first round. 18d Jonathan Givony, +2 More Full Draft Coverage Draft Videos 1:09 Why Jonathan Givony loved the Heat's NBA draft 1:09 Spike Lee has hilarious saga waiting on Knicks' pick 1:14 Trade machine ESPN.com Illustration You be the GM Could your team land a superstar? Draft News Why other QBs have closed the gap on Mahomes Kevin Clark breaks down why Patrick Mahomes' decline in deep-ball throwing is helping other quarterbacks close the gap. Sources: Cavaliers extend president Koby Altman through '29-30 The Cavaliers have rewarded president Koby Altman and other key members of the front office with multiyear extensions, sources said. Orlovsky explains the gap between Patrick Mahomes and Josh Allen Dan Orlovsky highlights how small the gap is between Patrick Mahomes and Josh Allen among the best quarterbacks in the NFL. 2025 NBA summer league: First impressions on the rookie class and other key notes Cooper Flagg led the summer league headlines, but which other rookies stood out in Las Vegas? Our NBA insiders have you covered. Warriors pull away against Jazz The Warriors defeat the Jazz 103-93 behind Gabe Madsen's 22-point performance. Clippers roll Bucks in 106-91 victory Patrick Baldwin Jr. leads all scorers with 22 points as the Clippers clobber the Bucks.
